column2: "Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE; na oye: Na n'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."
"Afei wɔmma Israel nka
"Wɔmma Aaron ne fifo so wɔnka Dɛ n'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."
"Wɔmma hɔn a wosuro EWURADZE nyina wɔnka
"Mifi m'ahokyer mu mefrɛɛ EWURADZE: EWURADZE gyee me do na ɔdze me sii bea a ɔtrɛ do."
"EWURADZE dzi m'afa; murunnsuro: Ebɛnadze na nyimpa botum ayɛ me?"
"EWURADZE dzi m'afa dɛ mo boafo: Dɛm ntsi mubohu m'apɛdze wɔ hɔn a wɔtan me no do."
"Oye dɛ wɔtwer EWURADZE Kyɛn dɛ wɔdze werɛ bɛhyɛ nyimpa mu."
"Oye dɛ wɔtwer EWURADZE Kyɛn dɛ wɔdze werɛ bɛhyɛ ahemfo mu."
"Amanaman nyinara twaa mo ho hyiae: EWURADZE ne dzin mu na mutwitwaa hɔn gui."
"Wotwaa mo ho hyiae
column4: wotwaa mo ho hyiae: EWURADZE ne dzin mu na mubotwitwa hɔn egu."

column2: "Wotwaa mo ho hyiaa dɛ ndowa; woedum hɔn dɛ nsoɛ mu ogya: EWURADZE ne dzin mu na mubotwitwa hɔn egu."
"Wɔpeem me ta ma nkyɛ morohwe ase: Na EWURADZE boaa me."
"EWURADZE nye m'ahoɔdzen na mo ndwom; Na ɔabɛyɛ mo nkwagye."
"Ehurusi na nkwagye ndze wɔ atseneneefo asesee mu: EWURADZE n'abanyimfa yɛ mbanyindze."
"EWURADZE n'abanyimfa ama do: EWURADZE n'abanyimfa yɛ mbanyindze."
"Munnkowu
column4: Na maka EWURADZE no ndwuma makyerɛ."

column2: "EWURADZE atsea me yaayaw: Naaso onngyaa mo mu nnhyɛɛ owu nsa."
"Hom mbuebue ndzeyɛtsenenee aponkɛse no mma me; Mebɛhɛn mu
"EWURADZE no ponkɛse nye yi; Atseneneefo bɛhɛn mu."
"Medze ndaase bɛma wo
column3: osiandɛ ɔwo na agye me do

column2: "Ɔbo a adantofo powee no Ɔabɛyɛ kutuwdo bo."
"Iyi EWURADZE ne nyɛe a; Ɔyɛ nwanwa wɔ hɛn enyiwa do."
"Iyi nye da a EWURADZE ayɛ; Yebedzi ehurusi na hɛn enyi agye wɔ mu."
"Ao
"Osiarfo nye nyia ɔnam EWURADZE dzin mu reba no: Yefi EWURADZE fie ehyira wo."
"EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn
column3: na ɔama hɛn kan: Hom mfa ndubaa nkitsa hom nsamu nhyɛ fa no ase
column4: na hom mbɔ afɔrmbukyia no ho aprɔw."

column2: "Ɔwo enye me Nyankopɔn
column3: na medze ndaase bɛma wo: Ɔwo enye me Nyankopɔn

column2: "Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE
